entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 800 metres before morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries at times heavy in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
